biotools.summary: riboCIRC is a comprehensive database of translatable circRNAs. Translation of circular RNAs (circRNAs) now has drawn increasing attention from researchers due to their emerging roles of the functional peptides encoded by circRNAs as new players involved in the regulation of gene expression.
